title: Fermat's Last Theorem for Selmer sections
summary: We prove, in the context of the section conjecture, that every Selmer section over $\mathbb{Q}$ of the affine Fermat curve with exponent $\ell$ is cuspidal for $\ell\geq 7$.

AI.tldr: 证明了在截面猜想背景下，对于指数ℓ≥7的仿射费马曲线，其所有在ℚ上的Selmer截面都是尖点截面
AI.motivation: 研究费马曲线在截面猜想框架下的Selmer截面性质，特别是验证这些截面是否都是尖点截面
AI.method: 在截面猜想的背景下，对仿射费马曲线进行分析，证明其Selmer截面的尖点性质
AI.result: 证明了当指数ℓ≥7时，所有在ℚ上的Selmer截面都是尖点截面
AI.conclusion: 该结果为截面猜想在费马曲线情形提供了支持证据，表明Selmer截面与几何截面之间存在密切联系

title: Dynamical GCD Problems and a Variant of the Dynamical Mordell-Lang Conjecture
summary:
In \cite{NZ25}, the authors resolved the rational function analogue of the finiteness results for greatest common divisors of iterates of polynomials established in \cite{HT17}. These results may be viewed as dynamical generalizations of a classical problem concerning upper bounds for the greatest common divisors (GCDs) of two integer sequences studied by Bugeaud, Corvaja, and Zannier. The most delicate case arises when the maps involved are automorphisms, where the methods of \cite{NZ25} and \cite{HT17} rely heavily on Diophantine approximation and asymptotic analysis.
  In the present paper, we develop an alternative approach to the automorphism case. This method is more powerful, allowing us to give complete answers to the further questions posed in \cite{HT17}. In particular, we strengthen the main theorem of \cite{HT17} and provide an alternative proof of the main theorem of \cite{NZ25} in the automorphism setting.
  Moreover, we relate this dynamical GCD problem to a special case of a higher-dimensional generalization of the Dynamical Mordell--Lang Conjecture proposed by Junyi Xie. We establish this generalized conjecture when the dynamics arise from algebraic group actions. In addition, we resolve the corresponding special case associated with dynamical GCD questions when the maps involved are polynomials.

AI.tldr: 本文为有理函数迭代的最大公约数（GCD）问题提供了新方法，特别针对自同构情形，改进了先前结果，并建立了与广义Dynamical Mordell-Lang猜想的联系。
AI.motivation: 先前研究（NZ25, HT17）使用丢番图逼近和渐近分析方法处理有理函数迭代的GCD问题，但自同构情形特别复杂。本文旨在开发更强大的替代方法，解决HT17中提出的进一步问题，并将该问题与更高维的Dynamical Mordell-Lang猜想联系起来。
AI.method: 开发了处理自同构情形的替代方法，该方法比先前方法更强大。将动态GCD问题与Junyi Xie提出的高维Dynamical Mordell-Lang猜想的特殊情形联系起来，并针对代数群作用建立了该猜想。
AI.result: 1. 加强了HT17的主要定理；2. 为NZ25在自同构情形下的主要定理提供了替代证明；3. 建立了动态GCD问题与广义Dynamical Mordell-Lang猜想的联系；4. 当动态来自代数群作用时，证明了该广义猜想；5. 解决了多项式映射对应的特殊情形。
AI.conclusion: 本文为有理函数迭代的GCD问题提供了更强大的新方法，特别改进了自同构情形的处理，建立了与高维Dynamical Mordell-Lang猜想的深刻联系，并解决了相关猜想在代数群作用下的情形。

title: The Golden Sieve and its connections to Hiccup sequences and Fraenkel games
summary: The golden sieve, a self-referential deletion process on increasing sequences of positive integers, was introduced by the author in 2002 (OEIS A099267). At each step, a pointer read from the working sequence designates which element to remove. Applied to the natural numbers, the sieve is governed by the golden ratio and recovers the Wythoff partition. We develop the theory of the golden sieve on arithmetic progressions and reveal new structural properties. The survivor sequence is a hiccup sequence in the sense of Fokkink and Joshi, whose gaps take exactly two consecutive values, selected by a rule that depends on the sequence itself. The resulting partition satisfies a Fraenkel-type complementary equation, and the gap word is Sturmian in the base case. A double sieve variant, where both pointer and target are removed at each step, yields three-way partitions of the integers. On perfect squares, the hiccup rule becomes doubly self-referential: the gap at step $n$ is controlled by whether $n$ is the square of a survivor index, so the sequence governs its own gaps through its squared values. A bootstrap argument yields the precise asymptotic growth of the survivors. We also introduce the extraction sieve $\mathcal{C}_{j,y,z}$, a family of processes that repeatedly extract and delete elements from the bottom of an infinite sequence. On $\mathbb{N}$, this sieve produces the $(j,1,y,z)$-hiccup sequence of Fokkink--Joshi, tautologically. Thus the ``silver sieve'' $\mathcal{C}_{1,3,2}$ on $\mathbb{N}$ is simply the Bosma--Dekking--Steiner $(1,1,3,2)$-hiccup with slope $1+\sqrt{2}$. On arithmetic progressions $a\mathbb{N}+b$, the sieve produces the new $(j,\,a{+}b,\,ay,\,az)$-hiccup via an affine action on parameter space, providing an algebraic bridge between sieves and hiccup sequences.

AI.tldr: 本文系统研究了黄金筛法及其变体在算术级数上的性质，揭示了幸存序列的hiccup结构、自指特性以及与Sturmian词、Fraenkel型互补方程的联系。
AI.motivation: 作者在2002年引入了黄金筛法（OEIS A099267），这是一种在递增正整数序列上的自指删除过程。本文旨在将黄金筛法理论扩展到算术级数上，揭示新的结构性质，并探索其与hiccup序列、Sturmian词等数学结构的联系。
AI.method: 1. 将黄金筛法应用于算术级数，分析幸存序列的结构特性；2. 研究幸存序列的hiccup性质（间隙仅取两个连续值）；3. 分析双筛变体（同时删除指针和目标元素）；4. 在完全平方数上研究双重自指特性；5. 引入提取筛法族C_{j,y,z}，建立筛法与hiccup序列之间的代数桥梁。
AI.result: 1. 幸存序列是Fokkink-Joshi意义上的hiccup序列，其间隙仅取两个连续值；2. 所得划分满足Fraenkel型互补方程，基础情况下的间隙词是Sturmian的；3. 双筛变体产生整数的三路划分；4. 在完全平方数上，间隙规则具有双重自指性；5. 提取筛法C_{j,y,z}在自然数上产生(j,1,y,z)-hiccup序列，在算术级数上通过参数空间的仿射作用产生新的hiccup序列。
AI.conclusion: 黄金筛法在算术级数上展现出丰富的数学结构，其幸存序列具有hiccup特性，间隙词具有Sturmian性质。提取筛法族为筛法与hiccup序列之间建立了代数联系，揭示了筛法过程与数论序列之间的深刻关系。

title: Product of powers of distinct primes as sums of Fibonacci numbers
summary: Let $F_n$ be the $n$-th Fibonacci number. In this paper, we study the Diophantine equation $F_n+F_m=p^xq^y$ in nonnegative integers $n\ge m$, $x$ and $y$, where $p$ and $q$ are fixed distinct prime numbers. We determine all pairs of primes $(q,p)$ with $q\le \min\{1000,p\}$ such that the above equation has at least two solutions $(x,y)$ (and corresponding $m,n$) in positive integers.

AI.tldr: 研究斐波那契数之和等于两个不同素数幂乘积的丢番图方程，确定了在特定条件下方程至少有两个正整数解的所有素数对
AI.motivation: 研究斐波那契数之和的素数幂分解问题，探索斐波那契数在数论中的特殊性质及其与素数幂的关系
AI.method: 通过分析Diophantine方程 $F_n+F_m=p^xq^y$，其中$p$和$q$是固定不同素数，$n\ge m$，$x,y$为非负整数。特别关注$q\le \min\{1000,p\}$的情况，确定方程至少有两个正整数解的所有素数对$(q,p)$
AI.result: 确定了所有满足条件的素数对$(q,p)$，其中$q\le \min\{1000,p\}$，使得方程$F_n+F_m=p^xq^y$至少有两个正整数解$(x,y)$（及对应的$m,n$）
AI.conclusion: 该研究完全刻画了在给定约束条件下斐波那契数之和表示为两个不同素数幂乘积时具有多个解的情况，为数论中斐波那契数的分解问题提供了新的结果

title: A function field analogue of Ligozat's theorem for Drinfeld modular units
summary:
Fix a nonzero level $\mathfrak{n} \in \mathbb{F}_q[T]$. In this paper, we first establish a function field analogue of Ligozat's theorem, which serves as our main result and provides a criterion for Drinfeld modular units on the Drinfeld modular curve $X_0(\mathfrak{n})$. We further conjecture that this criterion characterizes all Drinfeld modular units; we verify the conjecture in the cases of prime power level and of level equal to the product of two primes.
  Second, as an application of Drinfeld modular units, we investigate the rational cuspidal divisor class group $\mathcal{C}(\mathfrak{n})$ of $X_0(\mathfrak{n})$. We construct an injective map $g$ from the group of degree $0$ rational cuspidal divisors on $X_0(\mathfrak{n})$ to the group of Drinfeld modular units on $X_0(\mathfrak{n})$ tensored with $\mathbb{Q}$ over $\mathbb{Z}$. As a result, we establish an explicit upper bound for the exponent of $\mathcal{C}(\mathfrak{n})$ for general level $\mathfrak{n}$.

AI.tldr: 本文建立了函数域版本的Ligozat定理，为Drinfeld模曲线X₀(𝔫)上的Drinfeld模单位元提供了判别准则，并验证了该准则在素幂级和两个素数乘积级情况下的完备性。应用这些模单位元，研究了有理尖点除子类群，建立了有理尖点除子与Drinfeld模单位元之间的映射关系，并给出了类群指数的显式上界。
AI.motivation: 研究Drinfeld模曲线X₀(𝔫)上的Drinfeld模单位元，建立函数域版本的Ligozat定理，为模单位元提供判别准则。同时，利用模单位元研究有理尖点除子类群的结构，特别是其指数性质。
AI.method: 首先建立函数域版本的Ligozat定理，为Drinfeld模单位元提供判别准则。然后构造从度数为0的有理尖点除子群到Drinfeld模单位元张量ℚ的映射g，并证明其单射性。通过这个映射关系，推导有理尖点除子类群指数的上界。
AI.result: 1. 成功建立了函数域版本的Ligozat定理，为Drinfeld模单位元提供了判别准则。2. 验证了该准则在素幂级和两个素数乘积级情况下能够刻画所有Drinfeld模单位元。3. 构造了单射映射g，建立了有理尖点除子与Drinfeld模单位元之间的联系。4. 得到了有理尖点除子类群𝒞(𝔫)指数的显式上界。
AI.conclusion: 本文在函数域背景下建立了Drinfeld模单位元的判别准则，并验证了其在特定情况下的完备性。通过模单位元与有理尖点除子的联系，获得了有理尖点除子类群指数的上界，为理解Drinfeld模曲线的算术性质提供了新工具。

title: Modules of Jacobi forms of degree two of small levels
summary:
The purpose of this paper is to describe explicitly the modules of (Siegel-)Jacobi forms of degree two of index one of any scalar valued weight with respect to some congruence subgroups of small levels $N\leq 4$. Such a structure for the full Siegel modular group as a module over scalar valued Siegel modular forms of even weight has been explicitly given by T.~Ibukiyama. There we used an explicit structure theorem of rings of scalar valued Siegel modular forms by Igusa and that of vector valued Siegel modular forms of weight $\det^k\, \Sym^2$ by T. Satoh and T. Ibukiyama. On the other hand, for levels $N=2$, $3$, $4$, ring structures of scalar valued case
  have been also known by H. Aoki and T. Ibukiyama and $\det^k \Sym^2$-valued case by H. Aoki.
  In this paper, by merging these results, we give the same sort of simple structure theorems on modules of Jacobi forms of degree of two of index one for level $2$, $3$ and $4$.

AI.tldr: 本文给出了度数为2、指数为1的Jacobi形式在N=2,3,4级同余子群上作为标量值Siegel模形式模的显式结构定理
AI.motivation: Ibukiyama之前给出了全Siegel模群上Jacobi形式的模结构，但对于小级别N≤4的同余子群，需要类似的结构定理。已有Aoki和Ibukiyama对N=2,3,4级标量值Siegel模形式环结构的研究，以及Aoki对向量值模形式的研究，为建立Jacobi形式的模结构提供了基础。
AI.method: 结合Igusa、Satoh和Ibukiyama关于全Siegel模群模结构的结果，以及Aoki和Ibukiyama关于N=2,3,4级标量值Siegel模形式环结构和Aoki关于向量值模形式的结果，通过整合这些已知结构定理，推导出Jacobi形式的模结构。
AI.result: 成功给出了度数为2、指数为1的Jacobi形式在N=2,3,4级同余子群上作为标量值Siegel模形式模的简单结构定理，类似于Ibukiyama对全Siegel模群的结果。
AI.conclusion: 通过整合已有关于Siegel模形式环和模结构的研究成果，可以系统地建立小级别同余子群上Jacobi形式的模结构理论，为度数为2、指数为1的Jacobi形式提供了完整的结构描述。

title: A new class of Correlations insisting on Ramanujan expansions
comment: A T-S Correlation is a kind of unexpected wonder for its many simple properties, compare the paper, see the Abstract
summary: Studying Correlations with Ramanujan Expansions, we arrive to present the new class of, say, Two-Seasons Correlations, abbr. T-S, as a natural set expressing some of the features of, say, H-L-like Correlations; these are the ones that mimic the H-L ($=$Hardy-Littlewood) Correlation with shift $2k$, needed to study $2k-$twin primes following Hardy \& Littlewood Conjecture. After introducing the $3-$Hypotheses Correlations in a previous paper, we add two other, very natural, hypotheses: the fifth is a technical one, simplifying calculations; but the fourth is called 'Parity', since it deals with the parity of natural numbers we play with. In particular, we may build (devoting to this 'our mainstream', here) a single Correlation that satisfies these '5 Axioms', thus a T-S one, that 'entangles two different Correlations' (whence Two-Seasons: T-S) depending on $a$ ($=$ the shift) parity. For $a$ even, our 'Artifact' mimics the H-L Correlation, in fact $a=2k$; but, while H-L Correlation is 'negligible', say, on $a$ odd, our Artifact seems to compare at least in the order of magnitude to H-L Correlation on $a$ even, being linked to another additive problem. Namely, on $a$ even, the Artifact 'counts', say, classic solutions to: $p_1+a=p_2$, in odd primes $p_1,p_2$; while, on $a$ odd, it 'counts' solutions to: $p_1+a=2^j p_2$, again with odd primes $p_1,p_2$ and with $j\in \N$ (satisfying the natural arithmetic constraints). More in general, our T-S Correlations 'entangle' two different Diophantine equations.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种新的"双季相关性"（T-S相关性），它通过拉马努金展开研究相关性，能够根据参数奇偶性模拟不同的数论问题，特别是哈代-李特尔伍德相关性。
AI.motivation: 研究相关性在数论中的应用，特别是通过拉马努金展开来构建能够模拟哈代-李特尔伍德相关性的新相关性类型，以研究孪生素数等经典数论问题。
AI.method: 使用拉马努金展开研究相关性，在先前提出的3-假设相关性基础上增加两个新假设（技术性假设和奇偶性假设），构建满足5个公理的T-S相关性，根据参数奇偶性"纠缠"两种不同的相关性。
AI.result: 成功构建了T-S相关性，当参数为偶数时模拟哈代-李特尔伍德相关性（研究p₁+2k=p₂形式的素数对），当参数为奇数时研究p₁+a=2ʲp₂形式的素数方程，两种情况下相关性具有可比的数量级。
AI.conclusion: T-S相关性提供了一种统一框架，能够根据参数奇偶性自然地"纠缠"两种不同的丢番图方程，为研究素数分布和相关数论问题提供了新工具。
